name: youtarr
description: Youtarr is a self-hosted YouTube request and download manager that coordinates with media servers and Arr tools. Users can request videos, which are then fetched and organized automatically.

features.title: Web Interface
features.description: Allow users to request YouTube videos for download through a web interface with approval workflows

features.title: Automatic Downloads
features.description: Fetch requested videos automatically using yt-dlp with configurable quality and format settings

features.title: Media Library
features.description: Organize downloaded content into libraries compatible with Plex, Jellyfin, and Emby

features.title: File Upload
features.description: Monitor YouTube channels and automatically download new uploads based on defined rules

features.title: Storage Management
features.description: Set disk space limits and retention policies to automatically remove old or unwatched content
